content.customSteps: wait 1 sec
call api get "https://cleancookies.aws/exampleCompany"

open url "https://testrigorplayground.netlify.app/pages/verifycode"

// grab value by description "4 digit code" from "the element close to the code is" using AI and save it as "code"
grab value by description "4 digit code" using AI and save it as "code"

hover over middle of the screen

open url "https://www.google.com"

click "Search"

enter "TOTVS" into "Search"

type enter

check that page contains "WE ARE TOTVS, THE LARGEST TECHNOLOGY COMPANY IN ..."

open url "https://testrigor1playground.netlify.app/pages/buttonclick"

// click "Click" up to 10 times until "This text is now visible!" is visible

open url "https://qaplayground.dev/"

scroll down up to 15 times until "Dynamic table" is visible

generate from template "teste-regressivo-09-******@testrigor-mail.com" and save as "email"

send email to stored value "email" with subject "Test" and body "Hi, this is a test 12345", and attachment from saved value "perfil"

check that email to stored value "email" and "Test" in subject was received

grab value by template "#####" and save as "numero"

// click on "sample.pdf"
switch to tab 1

open url "https://testrigorplayground.netlify.app/pages/dynamiclogintext"

if page does not contain "Login" roughly below "Password" then
fail with error "page does not contain the word login anywhere"
else
click "Login"
check that page contains "successful login"
end

open url "https://testrigorplayground.netlify.app/pages/dynamiclogintext"

check that "Enter email" contains "example@example.com"

save value "10/16/2022" as "date"

check that page string with parameters "${date} is in the past using the american date format" using ai
check that statement is true string with parameters "${date} is in the past using the american date format"

call api get "https://rickandmortyapi.com/api/character/?page=19" and get "$.info.count" and save it as "variableName"

check that stored value "variableName" itself contains "826"

open url "https://qaplayground.dev/"

scroll down by 1/4 of the screen
scroll up on "Mini web apps"

scroll down on the middle of the screen up to 10 times until page contains "New Tab"
hover over middle of the screen

open url "https://www.google.com.br"

open url "https://www.saucedemo.com/"
enter "standard_user" into "Username"
check that "Username" has value "standard_user"

save value "123" as "variable"
check that stored value "variable" itself matches regex "\d*"

check that url contains "sauce"

open url "https://qaplayground.dev/apps/verify-account/"

check that page contains "Verify Your Account" //validação positiva
hover over middle of the screen

check that page does not contain "error message" //validação negativa
hover over middle of the screen

check that page contains simple template "The confirmation code is #-#-#-#-#-#" below "Verify Your Account" //com localização relativa
hover over middle of the screen

check that page has regex "(\d-)*(\d)"
hover over middle of the screen

check that property of "background-color" of "info" is equal to "rgba(250, 129, 66, 1)"
hover over middle of the screen

check that "container" contains "Verify Your Account"
hover over middle of the screen

call api get "https://rickandmortyapi.com/api" and save it as "rickAndMortyAPI"
check that stored value "rickAndMortyAPI" itself contains "character"

open url "https://www.saucedemo.com/"
Login com stored value "usuario" e stored value "senha"
click on "Add to cart" above "Sauce Labs Bolt T-shirt"

open url "https://qaplayground.dev/apps/budget-tracker/"

click "New entry"
select "Expense" from dropdown below "Type"
check that dropdown below "Type" contains "Expense" 
hover over middle of the screen

select "Income" from "Expense"
check that dropdown below "Type" contains "Income"

click "Income"
click "Expense"
check that dropdown below "Type" contains "Expense"

check that page contains "Income"

open url "https://testrigorplayground.netlify.app/pages/checkbox.html"

click on checkbox "First"
check that checkbox "First" is checked

click on checkbox "First"
check that checkbox "First" is unchecked

open url "https://text-compare.com/"
wait 1 sec up to 10 times until page contains "Paste one version"
hover over middle of the screen

enter text starting from next line and ending with [END]
Hello Max,
Let's discuss the opportunity
[END] into "Paste one version"

type enter
type "alguma coisa"
type ctrl+a
type delete
